english.segment1: Gather around to hear the future. Wonder what or who it will be. Rumors fly of the possibilities, everyone is taking a chance.
english.segment2: And I know, when everythings said and done, in the end, nothing they say will matter anyway.
english.segment3: Well always be just who we are. Well be okay no matter where we land.
english.segment4: Time to take the stage. Turn my eyes up towards the sky. The room is very dark, but somehow theres light in here.
english.segment5: And I know, when everythings said and done, in the end, nothing they say will matter anyway.
english.segment6: Well always be just who we are. Well be okay no matter where we land. (x 2)
english.segment7: So here we are. Better put on The happy face, Open up the curtains, Show the final word what they want, what they want..
english.segment8: Well always be just who we are. Well be okay no matter where we land. (x 2)
